title: Track Awesome Coldfusion Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Coldfusion (seancoyne/awesome-coldfusion) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome ColdFusion frameworks, libraries and software.

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Dec 29, 2021
items.content_text:
### Testing

*   [MockBox](https://testbox.ortusbooks.com/mocking/mockbox) - The ColdFusion Mocking/Stubbing Framework

### Dependency Injection

*   [ColdSpring (⭐5)](https://github.com/coldspringframework/coldspring1) - ColdSpring makes the configuration and dependencies of your CFCs easier to manage. ColdSpring brings the power of the popular Spring framework for Java to ColdFusion.
*   [Wirebox](https://wirebox.ortusbooks.com/) - The Enterprise Dependency Injection Framework

### CMS

*   [Mura](https://www.murasoftware.com/)
*   [Slatwall](https://www.slatwallcommerce.com/) - An Open Source Commerce Platform

### REST

*   [ColdBox REST](https://coldbox.ortusbooks.com/digging-deeper/recipes/building-rest-apis) - Native REST routing and rendering capababilities

### Other Libraries

*   [CacheBox](https://cachebox.ortusbooks.com/) - The Enterprise ColdFusion Caching Engine, Aggregator and API
*   [LogBox](https://logbox.ortusbooks.com/) - The Enterprise ColdFusion Logging Library

### Tools

*   [CommandBox](https://www.ortussolutions.com/products/commandbox) - ColdFusion (CFML) CLI, Package Manager, REPL and more

### Resources

*   [CFRepo](http://www.cfmlrepo.com/) - A repository of ColdFusion installers created by Gavin Pickin
*   ACF Docker Images on [Amazon ECR](https://gallery.ecr.aws/adobe/coldfusion) and [Docker Hub](https://hub.docker.com/u/adobecoldfusion) - Official Docker images from Adobe
*   Lucee Docker Images [Docker Hub](https://hub.docker.com/u/lucee) - Official Docker images from Lucee
items.content_html:

  • Wirebox - The Enterprise Dependency Injection Framework

Resources

  • CFRepo - A repository of ColdFusion installers created by Gavin Pickin
  • ACF Docker Images on Amazon ECR and Docker Hub - Official Docker images from Adobe
  • Lucee Docker Images Docker Hub - Official Docker images from Lucee

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Jun 09, 2018
items.content_text:
### Application Frameworks

*   [CFWheels](https://cfwheels.org) - An open source CFML framework inspired by Ruby on Rails.

### REST

*   [CFWheels RESTful](https://guides.cfwheels.org/docs/routing) - CFWheels encourages a conventional RESTful and resourceful style of request handling.

### Editors

*   [CFML Package for Sublime Text 3 (⭐114)](https://github.com/jcberquist/sublimetext-cfml) - CFML syntax highlighting as well as function and tag completions for [Sublime Text 3](http://www.sublimetext.com)
*   [CFML Extension for Visual Studio Code](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=KamasamaK.vscode-cfml) - CFML Language extension for [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/)
*   [CFML Language for Atom (⭐37)](https://github.com/atuttle/atom-language-cfml) - CFML Language plugin for [Atom](https://atom.io/)
items.content_html:
Application Frameworks

  • CFWheels - An open source CFML framework inspired by Ruby on Rails.

REST

  • CFWheels RESTful - CFWheels encourages a conventional RESTful and resourceful style of request handling.

Editors

  • CFML Package for Sublime Text 3 (⭐114) - CFML syntax highlighting as well as function and tag completions for Sublime Text 3
  • CFML Extension for Visual Studio Code - CFML Language extension for VSCode
  • CFML Language for Atom (⭐37) - CFML Language plugin for Atom

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Jun 01, 2016
items.content_text:
### Resources

*   [lucee5-heroku (⭐9)](https://github.com/mikesprague/lucee5-heroku) - Application template for deploying Lucee 5 apps to Heroku by Mike Sprague
*   [Vagrant LEMTL (⭐38)](https://github.com/mikesprague/vagrant-lemtl) - Vagrant box with Linux, Nginx, MariaDB (or MySQL), Tomcat, and Lucee for local development with CFML by Mike Sprague
items.content_html:
Resources

  • lucee5-heroku (⭐9) - Application template for deploying Lucee 5 apps to Heroku by Mike Sprague
  • Vagrant LEMTL (⭐38) - Vagrant box with Linux, Nginx, MariaDB (or MySQL), Tomcat, and Lucee for local development with CFML by Mike Sprague

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Jan 18, 2016
items.content_text:
### Other Libraries

*   [Moment.cfc (⭐44)](https://github.com/AlumnIQ/momentcfc) - Moment.js inspired date/time manipulation library for CFML (not a direct port)
items.content_html:
Other Libraries

  • Moment.cfc (⭐44) - Moment.js inspired date/time manipulation library for CFML (not a direct port)

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Dec 16, 2015
items.content_html:
NoSQL

  • CFArango (⭐4) - ArangoDB client for ColdFusion

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Dec 15, 2015
items.content_text:
### Application Frameworks

*   [ColdBox](http://www.coldbox.org) - The Enterprise ColdFusion MVC Development Platform
*   [FW/1 - Framework One (⭐369)](https://github.com/framework-one/fw1) - a lightweight, convention over configuration, MVC application framework

### Testing

*   [CFSelenium (⭐82)](https://github.com/teamcfadvance/CFSelenium) - A native Selenium RC binding for ColdFusion
*   [TestBox (⭐66)](https://github.com/Ortus-Solutions/TestBox) - BDD style unit testing framework

### CMS

*   [CONTENS CMS](http://www.contens.com/) - Professional Content Management
*   [FarCry CMS (⭐7)](https://github.com/farcrycore/plugin-farcrycms)

### REST

*   [Taffy](http://taffy.io) - The REST Web Service framework for ColdFusion and Railo

### Other Libraries

*   [cfbackport (⭐27)](https://github.com/misterdai/cfbackport) - Back porting features contained in newer versions of ColdFusion.
*   [cfpayment (⭐91)](https://github.com/ghidinelli/cfpayment) - ColdFusion payment processing library makes plumbing e-commerce apps easy. Charging credit cards has never been easier. Inspired by Ruby's ActiveMerchant.

### Editors

*   [IntelliJ Idea](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) - Java IDE, CFML Support available via [plugin (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/JetBrains/intellij-plugins/tree/master/CFML)
*   [cfbrackets](http://cfbrackets.org) - adds support for ColdFusion Markup Language (CFML) to [Brackets Code Editor](http://brackets.io/)

### References

*   [CF411](http://carehart.org/cf411/) - CF411: 1,800+ Tools and Resources for CFers, (in over 150 categories) by Charlie Arehart
*   [ColdFusion Koans (⭐56)](https://github.com/nodoherty/ColdFusion-Koans) - The ColdFusion Koans are a set of unit tests that the user must make pass by filling in values
*   [ColdFusion UI the Right Way (⭐100)](https://github.com/cfjedimaster/ColdFusion-UI-the-Right-Way) - A list of articles demonstrating how to do UI with ColdFusion on the back end.
*   [Learn CF in a Week](http://www.learncfinaweek.com) - community driven training program that teaches all the basics you need to be a ColdFusion Developer in one week.

### Documentation

*   [CFML Tags to CFScript Reference (⭐38)](https://github.com/cfchef/cfml-tag-to-script-conversions) -  CFML Tag to Script Conversions by Tony Junkes
*   [Lucee Wiki](https://bitbucket.org/lucee/lucee/wiki/Home) - Official Lucee Documentation
*   [Official Lucee Server Documentation](http://docs.lucee.org/) - New Lucee Documentation
*   [Railo Documentation (⭐252)](https://github.com/getrailo/railo/wiki) - Official Railo docs
items.content_html:
Application Frameworks

  • ColdBox - The Enterprise ColdFusion MVC Development Platform
  • FW/1 - Framework One (⭐369) - a lightweight, convention over configuration, MVC application framework

Testing

  • CFSelenium (⭐82) - A native Selenium RC binding for ColdFusion
  • TestBox (⭐66) - BDD style unit testing framework

CMS

  • CONTENS CMS - Professional Content Management
  • FarCry CMS (⭐7)

REST

  • Taffy - The REST Web Service framework for ColdFusion and Railo

Other Libraries

  • cfbackport (⭐27) - Back porting features contained in newer versions of ColdFusion.
  • cfpayment (⭐91) - ColdFusion payment processing library makes plumbing e-commerce apps easy. Charging credit cards has never been easier. Inspired by Ruby's ActiveMerchant.

Editors

  • IntelliJ Idea - Java IDE, CFML Support available via plugin (⭐2.2k)
  • cfbrackets - adds support for ColdFusion Markup Language (CFML) to Brackets Code Editor

References

  • CF411 - CF411: 1,800+ Tools and Resources for CFers, (in over 150 categories) by Charlie Arehart
  • ColdFusion Koans (⭐56) - The ColdFusion Koans are a set of unit tests that the user must make pass by filling in values
  • ColdFusion UI the Right Way (⭐100) - A list of articles demonstrating how to do UI with ColdFusion on the back end.
  • Learn CF in a Week - community driven training program that teaches all the basics you need to be a ColdFusion Developer in one week.

Documentation

  • CFML Tags to CFScript Reference (⭐38) - CFML Tag to Script Conversions by Tony Junkes
  • Lucee Wiki - Official Lucee Documentation
  • Official Lucee Server Documentation - New Lucee Documentation
  • Railo Documentation (⭐252) - Official Railo docs

items.title: Awesome Coldfusion Updates on Jul 18, 2014
items.content_text:
### Engines

*   [Adobe ColdFusion](http://www.adobe.com/products/coldfusion-family.html)

### Application Frameworks

*   [FarCry](http://www.farcrycore.org) - FarCry Core is a web application framework that helps CFML developers build tailor-made content solutions, fast.

### Testing

*   [MXUnit (⭐88)](https://github.com/mxunit/mxunit) - xUnit style unit testing framework
*   [mxunit-watch (⭐13)](https://github.com/atuttle/mxunit-watch) - watch a directory for file changes (.cfc, .cfm, .xml) to trigger mxunit test suite full run, displaying results in the console

### Dependency Injection

*   [DI/1 - Inject One (⭐104)](https://github.com/framework-one/di1) - a very lightweight, convention over configuration, dependency injection (inversion of control) framework

### CMS

*   [ContentBox (⭐128)](https://github.com/Ortus-Solutions/ContentBox) - A powerful modular content management engine
*   [Preside CMS (⭐77)](https://github.com/pixl8/Preside-CMS) - an open source CMS for the Railo language

### NoSQL

*   [CFCouchbase (⭐17)](https://github.com/Ortus-Solutions/cfcouchbase-sdk) - Couchbase NoSQL and caching client wrapper for ColdFusion
*   [cfmongodb (⭐89)](https://github.com/marcesher/cfmongodb) - MongoDB client wrapper for ColdFusion

### REST

*   [FW/1 REST (⭐369)](https://github.com/framework-one/fw1/wiki/Developing-Applications-Manual#controllers-for-rest-apis) - Native REST routing and rendering capababilities

### Other Libraries

*   [JavaLoader (⭐61)](https://github.com/markmandel/JavaLoader) - JavaLoader is a library that has been built to ease the use, development and integration of Java within ColdFusion applications.
*   [Mustache.cfc (⭐46)](https://github.com/rip747/Mustache.cfc) - [{{ mustache }}](http://mustache.github.io) for ColdFusion
*   [UnderscoreCF (⭐90)](https://github.com/russplaysguitar/UnderscoreCF) - An UnderscoreJS port for Coldfusion. Functional programming library.

### Editors

*   [Adobe ColdFusion Builder 3](http://www.adobe.com/products/coldfusion-builder.html) - Eclipse based ColdFusion IDE from Adobe
*   [CFEclipse](http://cfeclipse.org) - CFML Plugin for [Eclipse](http://www.eclipse.org/)
*   [TextMate (⭐15)](https://github.com/textmate/coldfusion.tmbundle) - [TextMate](http://macromates.com) support for ColdFusion

### Documentation

*   [CFDocs](http://cfdocs.org/) - UltraFast CFML Documentation Reference.
items.content_html:
Engines

  • Adobe ColdFusion

Application Frameworks

  • FarCry - FarCry Core is a web application framework that helps CFML developers build tailor-made content solutions, fast.

Testing

  • MXUnit (⭐88) - xUnit style unit testing framework
  • mxunit-watch (⭐13) - watch a directory for file changes (.cfc, .cfm, .xml) to trigger mxunit test suite full run, displaying results in the console

Dependency Injection

  • DI/1 - Inject One (⭐104) - a very lightweight, convention over configuration, dependency injection (inversion of control) framework

CMS

  • ContentBox (⭐128) - A powerful modular content management engine
  • Preside CMS (⭐77) - an open source CMS for the Railo language

NoSQL

  • CFCouchbase (⭐17) - Couchbase NoSQL and caching client wrapper for ColdFusion
  • cfmongodb (⭐89) - MongoDB client wrapper for ColdFusion

REST

  • FW/1 REST (⭐369) - Native REST routing and rendering capababilities

Other Libraries

  • JavaLoader (⭐61) - JavaLoader is a library that has been built to ease the use, development and integration of Java within ColdFusion applications.
  • Mustache.cfc (⭐46) - {{ mustache }} for ColdFusion
  • UnderscoreCF (⭐90) - An UnderscoreJS port for Coldfusion. Functional programming library.

Editors

  • Adobe ColdFusion Builder 3 - Eclipse based ColdFusion IDE from Adobe
  • CFEclipse - CFML Plugin for Eclipse
  • TextMate (⭐15) - TextMate support for ColdFusion

Documentation

  • CFDocs - UltraFast CFML Documentation Reference.
